title: Hour 3 - Gary Bettman (05-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Gary Bettman (05-27-20)
description:
NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman says the reason for the 24 team playoff format is due to the fact that they had so many bubble teams and this is the fair way to resolve that issue. Bettman says they have not made final decisions on the cities they will play in; he says the corona virus data will be the determining factor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
